data.title: Lionel Messi
data.meta_description: #3 Lionel Messi on the 2024 The World's Highest-Paid Athletes - Messi claimed the Ballon d'Or as the world's best soccer player for a record eighth time
data.text:
High Copa América Ticket Prices Led To Many Empty Seats

Unless Lionel Messi and Argentina are playing you will see far too many empty seats at the 2024 Copa América. This is bad for the game in the Americas.

Lionel Messi Pleases Fans In New York As Argentina Reach Copa America Final

Argentina defeated Canada at the MetLife Stadium in New Jersey, where Lionel Messi was, as usual, the star attraction for soccer fans.

Photo of FC Barcelona Idol Lionel Messi ‘Blessing’ Baby Lamine Yamal Goes Viral

A photo of FC Barcelona idol Lionel Messi "blessing" a baby Lamine Yamal has gone viral after being shared by the Spain winger's father.

Inter Miami Could Win Premier League With FC Barcelona Idol Messi, Says Aguero

Inter Miami is capable of winning the Premier League by boasting FC Barcelona idol and 'GOAT' Lionel Messi, according to a close friend of the Argentine in Sergio Aguero

FC Barcelona Icon Lionel Messi Reveals Player That Made Him Angriest

FC Barcelona icon Lionel Messi revealed the player that made him the angriest in his career during an appearance on a podcast.

FC Barcelona Icon Lionel Messi’s Son Thiago: ‘I Want To Play With Lamine And For Argentina’

Lionel Messi's son Thiago revealed he wants to play with FC Barcelona prodigy Lamine Yamal, and for Argentina not Spain.

Messi Says As FC Barcelona Fan He ‘Didn’t Want Real Madrid To Win Champions League’ And Chooses Best Ever Team

FC Barcelona icon Lionel Messi said that he didn't want Real Madrid to win the Champions League as a fan of the club, and also chose the best team of all time.

Mourinho Picks FC Barcelona Icon Messi Over Ronaldo As Best Of Generation

Jose Mourinho chose FC Barcelona legend Lionel Messi as the best playe his generation over compatriot Cristiano Ronaldo

FC Barcelona Icon Lionel Messi Confirms Last Club And Discusses Retirement

FC Barcelona legend Lionel Messi has confirmed which will be his last club before retirement in an interview released this week.

Lionel Messi And Argentina Are Big Favourites At Copa América 2024

Can Lionel Messi lead tournament favourites Argentina to a third consecutive major trophy at the Copa América 2024?

FC Barcelona Star Lamine Yamal Talks Messi Comparisons And Media Attacks

FC Barcelona prodigy Lamine Yamal discussed comparisons he receives to Lionel Messi and harsh media treatment on the cusp of the Euros with Spain.

Messi’s Vancouver Absence Shows Need For MLS Competitive Changes

Inter Miami is holding Lionel Messi and company out against the Vancouver Whitecaps in part because the negative competitive consequences are minimal.

Lionel Messi Makes History As Inter Miami Hit NY Red Bulls For Six

Inter Miami have defeated New York Red Bulls 6-2, and Lionel Messi scored one and assisted five in an historical night in Florida.

Real Madrid Ace Vinicius Jr. Equals FC Barcelona Icon Lionel Messi

Real Madrid ace Vinicius Jr. has equalled FC Barcelona great Lionel Messi in one highly-respected area of the game.

How Jorge Mas Signed Lionel Messi And Transformed Inter Miami

Jorge Mas made a lucrative bet on Lionel Messi and transformed Inter Miami into MLS' second billion-dollar franchise.
